products.title: Choices Harrow Navy Roller Blind

products.title: Harrow Lagoon Blue Roman Blind
products.description: Smooth texture and suave shade are combined in this beautiful, trendy fabric. The gentle teal shade is cool and really fashionable right now. This colour combines really well with greys and darker blues, for a truly contemporary look that zings with understated vibrance. products.title: Harrow Navy Roman Blind
products.description: With the look of smooth denim, and a sophisticated finish, the harrow navy roman blind is a lovely addition to family homes that are in need of trendy shading.
